Changelog
=========

0.1.2 (2013-03-23)
------------------

New
~~~

- Support for list indexes (see README.rst). [Valentin Lab]

- Catch exceptions when parsing structure and output a clean error
  message. [Valentin Lab]

0.1.1 (2013-02-27)
------------------

Changes
~~~~~~~

- Doc: some minor enhancements, and an "Install" section. [Valentin Lab]
